verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w vials|strong="G5357"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, Come \w hither|strong="G1204"\w*; I will \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w whore|strong="G4204"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*:

\w With|strong="G3326"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* have committed \w fornication|strong="G4203"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="G2730"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* have been made \w drunk|strong="G3184"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* he \w carried|strong="G0667"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* away \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* a scarlet \w coloured|strong="G2847"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of \w names|strong="G3686"\w* of \w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* was arrayed \w in|strong="G4016"\w* \w purple|strong="G4209"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* scarlet \w colour|strong="G2847"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w decked|strong="G5558"\w* with \w gold|strong="G5557"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of \w abominations|strong="G0946"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filthiness|strong="G0168"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w forehead|strong="G3359"\w* \add was\add* a \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w MYSTERY|strong="G3466"\w*, \w BABYLON|strong="G0897"\w* THE \w GREAT|strong="G3173"\w*, THE \w MOTHER|strong="G3384"\w* OF \w HARLOTS|strong="G4204"\w* \w AND|strong="G2532"\w* \w ABOMINATIONS|strong="G0946"\w* OF THE \w EARTH|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w drunken|strong="G3184"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w martyrs|strong="G3144"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w* with \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w admiration|strong="G2295"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* said \w unto|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* didst thou \w marvel|strong="G2296"\w*? \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w tell|strong="G2046"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* that \w carrieth|strong="G0941"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w*.

The \w beast|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G1492"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="G2258"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G3756"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2076"\w*; \w and|strong="G3195"\w* \w shall|strong="G0305"\w* \w ascend|strong="G1537"\w* out \w of|strong="G3588"\w* the bottomless \w pit|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G0684"\w* \w perdition|strong="G5217"\w*: \w and|strong="G2296"\w* they \w that|strong="G2730"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1909"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* the \w earth|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w wonder|strong="G3588"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3756"\w* \w names|strong="G1909"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G1125"\w* \w written|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G3588"\w* the \w book|strong="G3588"\w* of \w life|strong="G0575"\w* \w from|strong="G2602"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2889"\w* of the \w world|strong="G0991"\w*, when they \w behold|strong="G3588"\w* the \w beast|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G5100"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G3756"\w* \w is|strong="G2539"\w* \w not|strong="G2076"\w*, and \w yet|strong="G2076"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*.

And \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \add is\add* the \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* which \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*. The \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*, \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w which|strong="G0846"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*: \w five|strong="G4002"\w* are \w fallen|strong="G4098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \add and\add* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* is not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*, he \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* a short \w space|strong="G3641"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w eighth|strong="G3590"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w goeth|strong="G5217"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="G1492"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* have \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w no|strong="G3768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* as \w yet|strong="G3768"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mind|strong="G1106"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w give|strong="G1239"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strength|strong="G1849"\w* unto the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* shall make \w war|strong="G4170"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* shall \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w lords|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add are\add* \w called|strong="G2822"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, The \w waters|strong="G5204"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="G1492"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* the \w whore|strong="G4204"\w* \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w*, \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w peoples|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="G1492"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w these|strong="G3778"\w* shall \w hate|strong="G3404"\w* the \w whore|strong="G4204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w desolate|strong="G2049"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w burn|strong="G2618"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w put|strong="G1325"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* to \w fulfil|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G1106"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w agree|strong="G4160"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* unto the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w words|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall be \w fulfilled|strong="G5055"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="G1492"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* that \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w which|strong="G2192"\w* \w reigneth|strong="G0932"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.
